entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • We shuld have good documentation links for installing VS build tools or Mono #70281
  • Visual Studio reports warnings in auto-generated tagged files #70280
  • IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) is incorrectly suppressed if a nameof expression is used anywhere in the body. #70276
  • Deprecate syntax serialization logic. #70275
  • Cannot build deeply nested hierarchies with .NET 8 RC 1 SDK (e.g. Microsoft.AspNetCore.Odata) #70272
  • `SemanticModel.GetAliasInfo` returns null when non named types are aliased #70269
  • Incorrectly correcting a lambda expression, changing the behaviour of a delegate #70268
  • Unexpected System.ArrayTypeMismatchException at execution time #70267

Closed

  • AddParameterCheck/InitializeMemberFromParameter refactorings should be resilient to the presence of IOperation nodes for compiler generated MyBase.New call #70004
    17.9
  • Include implicit `MyBase.New()` calls in VB Constructors #64354
    17.9
  • Cannot build deeply nested hierarchies with .NET 8 RC 1 SDK (e.g. Microsoft.AspNetCore.Odata) #70254
  • Run Code Analysis command does not report any violations when LSP pull diagnostics is enabled #65967
    18.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add empty file local class #70282
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid taking a lock the vast majority of the time in GlobalOptionService.GetOption #70278
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP - Remove IObjectWritable #70277
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP - Demonstrate removing syntax reading/writing from streams. #70274
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [17.8] Collection expressions: merge changes for conversions and optimizations #70273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Unskip working tests #70266
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Warn if collection expression to ref struct type incurs a heap allocation #70264
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Update VS version used for signed builds #70271
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify writing to asset buffer #70279
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix VB features impacted by IOperation change #70191
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: empty Span optimization #70260
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • EnC: simplify SymbolMatcher #70084
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Include implicit MyBase.New() call in IBlockOperation for VB Constructors #69873
    Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, untriaged, Next
  • Enable LSP pull diagnostics from Run Code Analysis command #70186
    Area-IDE, Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge stragglers from collection expressions into `main` branch #70265
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add support for using Mono to load .NET Framework projects #70263
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Expose fix all for refactorings as an experimental public API #69430
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Restore "Do source-generation only in our OOP process" #70109
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid cycle caused by calculation of ObsoleteState/ExperimentalState. #70171
    Area-Compilers, Tenet-Reliability, untriaged, 17.8
  • Avoid infinite cycle caused by an early binding of DefaultParameterValue attribute. #70242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle generic types as parameters of attributes in `MetadataDecoder` #70151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve completion in the context of pattern expressions #70262
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
